This well-Built and spacious 3 bhk house for sale in vandalur, chennai south seems to be an ideal choice for a peaceful abode for a family. Owing to its key locations, several landmarks like close to mall, close to highway and close to school are easily accessible. This house occupies a super built up area of 1454 sq.Ft. And contains 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms and 1 balcony. This 3 bhk house comes attached with 1 covered parking for your vehicle(s). This villa is currently under construction stage and you can expect to get the possession of the property by february 2027. This house is owned under freehold contract. This spacious house can be all yours at an attractive price of  1.47 crore. The independent house is designed very well and will provide modern facilities such as park, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center and security personnel. This independent house has access to clean 24*7 supply of water for its residents. This residential house is east-Facing direction. The well built vitrified flooring enhances the aesthetic appeal of this independent house. The vitrified flooring of this independent house is beautifully designed and helps to give it a pleasing look.

title: Aira Avenue Vandalur
desc:
Aira avenue is a plotted development project located in vandalur, chennai, offering 291 residential plots ranging from 585 to 2273 sq. Ft.. The project is situated on the vandalur - Oragadam state highway and is close to major transit routes, making it an ideal location for those looking for a well-Connected neighbourhood.

Project highlights:

- Regulatory approvals: Fully cmda and tn rera approved, ensuring a secure and lawful investment.
- Range of plot sizes: From 585 to 2273 sq. Ft., offering flexibility for both residential and investment purposes.
- Black top roads & electricity: Fully compounded plots with blacktop roads and 3-Phase electricity supply.
- Prime location advantages: Situated along the vandalur - Oragadam state highway, providing easy access to important transit points and commercial zones.

Educational institutions near plots for sale in vandalur chennai
Living in vandalur comes with access to several top-Tier educational institutions, making it ideal for families:
Colleges near vandalur plots
 Dhaanish ahamed college of engineering
 Peri institute of technology
 Bs abdur rahman university (Bs abdur rahman university)
Schools close to aira avenue
 Shree niketan cbse school
 Alwin international public school
 Velammal vidhyashram
These nearby institutions provide a rich educational ecosystem for families and young professionals.
Plots vandalur kelambakkam road  industrial hubs & employment opportunities
For professionals, aira avenues location near prominent industrial hubs offers vast employment opportunities:
 Apollo tyres (Apollo tyers careers)
 Johnson lifts
 Royal enfield manufacturing (Royal enfield job opportunities)
 Daimler automobiles
 Renault nissan

Amenities:

- Children's play area
- Recreation facilities
- Swimming pool
- Landscaping & tree planting
- Water conservation, rainwater harvesting
- 24x7 cctv surveillance
- _electrification (Transformer, solar energy etc.)_

The project is ready to move in, with possession starting from april 2024. Prices start from 36.85 lakhs onwards, with an average price of 6300 per sq. Ft..

title: Shriram Park 63
desc:
Residential apartment
This is your chance to a 3 bhk apartment / flat for sale in shriram park 63 perungalathur chennai . Where luxury comes with affordability.

Basic details:
You will love this bright and spacious 3 bedroom apartment with 2 bathrooms, modular kitchen, spacious hall and 2 balconies.The balcony offers a great view and is a place to enjoy at any time. This house provides ample natural light and has good ventilation that invites comfort.

Furnishings and amenities:
This impeccable house is spread across an area of 1535 sq.Ft. And is an unfurnished unit.
The amenities are designed to make your life easy, exciting and luxurious. The society boasts of manicured landscaping and includes lifts, intercom facility, security/fire alarm, maintenance staff, security personnel, visitor parking, swimming pool, gym, clubhouse, rainwater harvesting, piped gas, water storage, waste disposal and park.
The property is a quality construction.

Location:
The prime location provides residents with access to the very best that this city has to offer. The property is situated close to all the basic amenities. It is close to the main road making it highly accessible.
-Major banks and atms within proximity
-Schools within a close radius
-Easy access to public transport

Wait no more and schedule a tour today.
For more details, kindly contact the owner.

title: LINGA HOMES
desc: Looking for a 3 bhk property for sale in chennai south? Buy this 3 bhk flat in linga homes that is situated in urapakkam, chennai south. This residential flat is east-Facing direction. Constructed on a super built up area of 1566 sq.Ft., the flat comprises 3 bedroom(s), 3 bathrooms and 3 balconies. The flat has a total of 3 floors and this property is situated on 1st floor. This 0-1 year old property is available for immediate possession as the project is ready to move. The floor of this flat is beautifully designed using vitrified flooring, giving the flat an alluring look. Proximity to landmarks like close to school, close to hospital and close to railway station makes this an ideal property for families. The flat will offer a modern lifestyle as it is presented with many of the amenities such as lift(s). The housing society ensures a continuous supply of water to your flat from municipal corporation and borewell/tank.

Property description: Prime plot for sale in new perungalathur

Discover the perfect opportunity to build your dream home or invest in a prime piece of real estate in the rapidly developing area of new perungalathur. This spacious plot offers the ideal canvas for your vision, with a generous size that provides ample room for construction and landscaping.

Location: Situated in a peaceful neighborhood, the plot is conveniently located near key amenities such as schools, hospitals, shopping centers, and public transportation.

Spacious living areas: The villa boasts an open-Concept living and dining space, adorned with large windows that flood the interiors with natural light. Enjoy ample room for family gatherings and entertaining guests.

Modern kitchen: A beautifully designed kitchen equipped with high-Quality fixtures, ample storage, and modern appliances makes cooking a delightful experience.

Bedrooms: Featuring three generously sized bedrooms, each with attached bathrooms and built-In wardrobes. The master suite offers a private balcony, ideal for unwinding after a long day.

Outdoor spaces: The villa includes a well-Maintained garden area, perfect for outdoor activities or relaxing in the fresh air. The balcony and terrace offer additional spaces for outdoor lounging.

Amenities: Residents can enjoy access to a range of amenities, including 24/7 security, a children's play area, and dedicated parking spaces.

Prime location: Situated in the heart of new perungalathur, the property provides easy access to nearby schools, hospitals, shopping centers, and major transportation links, ensuring convenience at your doorstep.

Whether you're looking for a serene family home or an investment opportunity, this duplex villa in new perungalathur is the perfect choice. Don't miss the chance to own this remarkable propertyschedule a viewing today!

Aira avenue is a plotted development project located in vandalur, chennai, offering 291 residential plots ranging from 585 to 2273 sq. Ft.. - Regulatory approvals: Fully cmda and tn rera approved, ensuring a secure and lawful investment.
- Range of plot sizes: From 585 to 2273 sq. Ft., offering flexibility for both residential and investment purposes.
- Black top roads & electricity: Fully compounded plots with blacktop roads and 3-Phase electricity supply.
- Prime location advantages: Situated along the vandalur - Oragadam state highway, providing easy access to important transit points and commercial zones.

title: Isha Apartment
desc:
This lovely 3 bhk apartment/flat in vandalur is available for sale in one of chennai south's most popular projects, isha apartment. This residential flat is north-Facing direction. Constructed on a built up area of 1222 sq.Ft., the flat comprises 3 bedroom(s), 2 bathrooms and 1 balcony. The flat has a total of 5 floors and this property is situated on 1st floor. Moreover, the flat is currently under construction and possession is expected within 6 months. The beautifully designed ceramic flooring enhances the beauty of the flat. The society is well equipped with many modern amenities, including maintenance staff, visitor parking, lift(s), park and fitness centre / gym. The project provides a continuous supply of water to its flats.
 
 Additional details :

Piped gas facility is available in the property.
Daily needs shopping could be done within the society premises to make the stay convinent.
No power backup is available.
There is also a separate washroom for domestic help.
The society has dedicated security guards for every tower.

title: Isha Shubham
desc:
Isha shubham is one of the most popular destination for buying apartments/ flats in new perungalathur, chennai south. You too can be a part of this society by purchasing this 3 bhk flat here. The floor plan additionally contains 3 bedroom(s), 2 bathrooms . All in all, the flat is spread over a carpet area of 1259 sq.Ft. The flat has a total of 6 floors and this property is situated on 3rd floor. Being a ready to move project, you can expect immediate possession of this 1-5 years old property. The flat will offer a modern lifestyle as it is presented with many of the amenities such as lift(s). The society provides continuous water supply from municipal corporation and borewell/tank.
 Additional details :

Full power backup is available.
The society has dedicated security guards for every tower.

title: Aira Avenue Vandalur
desc:
Aira avenue is a plotted development project located in vandalur, chennai, offering 291 residential plots ranging from 585 to 2273 sq. Ft.. The project is situated on the vandalur - Oragadam state highway and is close to major transit routes, making it an ideal location for those looking for a well-Connected neighbourhood.

Project highlights:

- Regulatory approvals: Fully cmda and tn rera approved, ensuring a secure and lawful investment.
- Range of plot sizes: From 585 to 2273 sq. Ft., offering flexibility for both residential and investment purposes.
- Black top roads & electricity: Fully compounded plots with blacktop roads and 3-Phase electricity supply.
- Prime location advantages: Situated along the vandalur - Oragadam state highway, providing easy access to important transit points and commercial zones.

Educational institutions near plots for sale in vandalur chennai
Living in vandalur comes with access to several top-Tier educational institutions, making it ideal for families:
Colleges near vandalur plots
 Dhaanish ahamed college of engineering
 Peri institute of technology
 Bs abdur rahman university (Bs abdur rahman university)
Schools close to aira avenue
 Shree niketan cbse school
 Alwin international public school
 Velammal vidhyashram
These nearby institutions provide a rich educational ecosystem for families and young professionals.
Plots vandalur kelambakkam road  industrial hubs & employment opportunities
For professionals, aira avenues location near prominent industrial hubs offers vast employment opportunities:
 Apollo tyres (Apollo tyers careers)
 Johnson lifts
 Royal enfield manufacturing (Royal enfield job opportunities)
 Daimler automobiles
 Renault nissan

Amenities:

- Children's play area
- Recreation facilities
- Swimming pool
- Landscaping & tree planting
- Water conservation, rainwater harvesting
- 24x7 cctv surveillance
- _electrification (Transformer, solar energy etc.)_

The project is ready to move in, with possession starting from april 2024. Prices start from 36.85 lakhs onwards, with an average price of 6300 per sq. Ft..

title: Shriram Park 63
desc: Located in the popular residential address of perungalathur, chennai south, shriram park 63 is one of the most preferred destination for apartments in chennai south. This 3 bhk flat is your ticket to be a part of this community. The flat is facing the north-East direction. The flat is over 1770 sq.Ft. Super built up area and comes with 3 bedroom(s), 3 bathrooms and 2 balconies. The residential building has 13 floors in total and the flat for sale is located on the 3rd floor. This 0-1 year old property is available for immediate possession as the project is ready to move. The beautifully designed vitrified flooring enhances the beauty of the flat. Many of the modern amenities being offered, like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, grocery shop, lift(s), maintenance staff, visitor parking, water softening plant and security personnel, will provide a pleasant living experience for you. The residential project is well equipped to meet all your water needs through access to municipal corporation and borewell/tank supply.

title: Shriram Park 63
desc: Check out this 2 bhk apartment for sale in shriram park 63, a popular residential project that houses in-Demand flats in perungalathur, chennai south. This residential flat is north-East-Facing direction. The floor plan additionally contains 2 bedroom(s), 2 bathrooms and 1 balcony. All in all, the flat is spread over a super built up area of 1135 sq.Ft. The flat has a total of 13 floors and this property is situated on 5th floor. This residential flat is currently under construction and you can expect the possession of the same by april 2025. The floor of this flat is beautifully designed using vitrified flooring, giving the flat an alluring look. The flat will offer a modern lifestyle as it is presented with many of the amenities such as swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, grocery shop, lift(s), maintenance staff, visitor parking and water softening plant. The housing society ensures a continuous supply of water to your flat from borewell/tank and municipal corporation.

title: Premier JJS Garden
desc:
An affordable to mid-Income budget segment that majorly offers apartments, followed by plots and independent houses
Widespread connectivity via chennai outer ring road, mudichur, vandalur, and perungalathur-Nedungundram roads nearby
Mepz special economic zone and embassy splendid tech zone are nearly 6-12 km from perungalathur
Located about 20-22 km from tamarai tech park and it hubs in tharamani, perungudi, thoraipakkam
Guindy and sriperumbudur industrial estates are about 20 km from the locality
Professionals working near employment hubs prefer to rent apartments in this locale
A dedicated railway station on the chennai beach-Chengelpet section of the chennai suburban railway network
